{{Wireless embedded system |brand=ASUS |model=RP-AC55 |revision=A1 |series=AC1200 |serialnum_prefix=90IG03Z1-BM3R00 |asin=B073QJCJWG;GB; |price=69 |manuf_country=China |is_manuf=No |manuf=Edimax |manuf_model= |availability=now |fcc_date=03/30/2018 |fcc_id=MSQ-RPACRR00 |ic_id=3568A-RPACRR00 |pcb_id=1244-01001438-50Z |type=repeater, range extender, |pwr_v=100-240 |pwr_amp=0.25 |pwr_conn=NEMA 1-15P |pwr_vac=true |pwr_ac_hz=50/60 |cpu1_brand=Realtek |cpu1_model=RTL8197FS |cpu1_cspeed=1 GHz |fla1=16 |fla1_brand=Macronix |fla1_model=MX25L12835FM2I-10G |ram1=128 |ram1_brand=Realtek |ram1_model=RTL8197FS |wi1_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi1_chip1_model=RTL8197FS |wi1_802dot11_protocols=bgn |wi1_ant_conn=U.FL |wi1_txchains=2 |wi1_rxchains=2 |wi1_sstreams=2 |wi2_chip1_brand=Realtek |wi2_chip1_model=RTL8812BRH |wi2_802dot11_protocols=an+ac |wi2_ant_conn=U.FL |wi2_txchains=2 |wi2_rxchains=2 |wi2_sstreams=2 |eth_cpu=true |eth_chip2_brand=Realtek |eth_chip2_model=RTL8211FS |lan_speed=1GbE |lan_ports=1 |wan_ports= |addl_chips=5GHz Front End Module;Skyworks;SKY85742-11;SKY11, 85742, 0D00E;2; |802dot11_protocols=abgn+ac |default_ssid=ASUS_RPAC55, ASUS_RPAC55_5G |default_ssid_regex= |default_ip=192.168.1.1 |default_user=admin |default_pass=admin |oui=1C:B7:2C, 88:D7:F6, B1:74:02 |oui_eth=1C:B7:2C, 88:D7:F6, B1:74:02 }}
:• '''867''' Mbps - 2SS 5GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11ac#Data_rates_and_speed 802.11ac] (80MHz chan.), :• '''300''' Mbps - 2SS 2.4GHz [https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/IEEE_802.11n-2009#Data_rates 802.11n] (40MHz chan.) = '''''AC1200'' class'''
{{TagLine|Wireless-AC1200 Dual Band Repeater}} :{{SupportPage/sandbox|vendor=ASUS|model=RP-AC55}} *Web GUI: http://repeater.asus.com ===Overview=== *'''Extend fast Wi-Fi from router''' - Enjoy the combined dual-band speeds :of up to 1200 Mbps. *'''Improve Wi-Fi coverage throughout home''' - Dual-band antenna design :with two external antennas extends fast Wi-Fi coverage to every room. *'''Easy setup with signal indicator''' - Find the ideal place for RP-AC55 :using the LED signal indicator, and enjoy one-click setup. *'''ASUS Extender app''' - PC-free setup of network, anytime, anywhere. *'''Easy mode-switching''' – Instantly configure the best mode for needs: :Repeater, Access Point or Media Bridge. ===Reviews=== *[https://www.redeszone.net/asus/rp-ac55-ac1200/ ''ASUS RP-AC55'' on '''RedesZone'''] (ES) *[https://techtest.org/der-asus-rp-ac55-repeater-im-test/ ''ASUS RP-AC55'' on '''TechTest'''] (DE) *[https://www.speedguide.net/routers/asus-rp-ac55-wireless-ac1200-dual-band-repeater-4085 ''ASUS RP-AC55'' on '''SpeedGuide'''] ===GPL Info=== {{SCollapse|GPL info • >> |
# Realtek SoC
#export RT-RTL8198C := REALTEK=y RTL8198C=y XHCI=y RTK_NAND=y \
  #IPV6SUPP=y HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y LFP=y 
  PARENTAL2=y ACCEL_PPTPD=y USB="USB" BUILD_NAME="RT-RTL8198C" #DNSMQ=y MODEM=y 
  NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y OPTIMIZE_XBOX=y DEBUGFS=y JFFS2LOG=y REPEATER=y DUALWAN=y 
  USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y CFE_NVRAM_CHK=y #DUMP_OOPS_MSG=y JFFS2=y

export RP-AC68U := REALTEK=y RTL8198C=y XHCI=y RTK_NAND=y \
  HTTPS=y MIPS32=r2 BBEXTRAS=y USBEXTRAS=y EBTABLES=y SAMBA3=y MEDIASRV=y
  SMARTSYNCBASE=y PRINTER=y USB="USB" APP="installed" BUILD_NAME="RP-AC68U" 
  RPAC68U=y NVRAM_64K=y TFAT=y NTFS="tuxera" HFS="tuxera" ODMPID=y YAFFS=y 
  PSISTLOG=y REPEATER=y NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y 
  CONCURRENTREPEATER=y MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y NATNL_AICLOUD=y WEBDAV=y 
  REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y DEF_REPEATER=y

export RP-AC55 := REALTEK=y RTL8197F=y \
  HTTPS=y EBTABLES=y BUILD_NAME="RP-AC55" NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y REPEATER=y 
  NEW_USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y CONCURRENTREPEATER=y 
  MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y 
  DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y WLCSCAN_RSSI=y BT_CONN=y MUMIMO_5G=y DEF_REPEATER=y

export RP-AC53 := REALTEK=y RTL819X=y \
  HTTPS=y EBTABLES=y BUILD_NAME="RP-AC53" NVRAM_64K=y ODMPID=y REPEATER=y 
  USER_LOW_RSSI=y AUTODICT=y PROXYSTA=y DEBUGFS=y CONCURRENTREPEATER=y 
  MDNS=y FINDASUS=y TEMPROOTFS=y REDIRECT_DNAME=y DHCP_OVERRIDE=y SSH=y 
  DISABLE_NETWORKMAP=y DEF_REPEATER=y
}} ===See also=== *[[ASUS RP-AC87]] - ''Wireless-AC2600 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC87/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC68U]] - ''Wireless-AC1900 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC68U/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC66]] - ''Wireless-AC1750 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC66 PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC56]] - ''Wireless-AC1200 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC56/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC55]] - ''Wireless-AC1200 Dual Band Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC55/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC53]] - ''AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Repeater'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC53/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC52]] - ''AC750 Dual-Band Wi-Fi Repeater/AP'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RPAC52/ PPage] *[[ASUS RP-AC51]] - ''AC750 Wall-Plug Wi-Fi Range Extender'' • [https://www.asus.com/Networking/RP-AC51/ PPage] :''/Access Point/Media Bridge with Signal Indicator'' • [https://www.amazon.co.uk/dp/B07577ZQTB B07577ZQTB] :FCC ID: [https://fccid.io/MSQ-RPAC4200 MSQ-RPAC4200] (2020-04-09) [[SGE]] • QCA9531/[[Winbond]] __NOTOC__
